013    package net.sf.oval.exception;
014    
015    /**
016     * 
017     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
018     */
019    public class ValidationFailedException extends OValException
020    {
021            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
022    
023            public ValidationFailedException(final String message)
024            {
025                    super(message);
026            }
027    
028            public ValidationFailedException(final String message, final Throwable cause)
029            {
030                    super(message, cause);
031            }
032    }
